content.raw:
Yeah I know, right? I heard they're offering a prize for it ;)

I managed to use the snake-charming technique to bring the cable to the hand, but that's a lot of work... This also motivated me to revive some [code](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EhUd4JbY-8Q) for graphical manipulation of links @hsu wrote a couple years ago when I have some time :)
content.html:
Yeah I know, right? I heard they're offering a prize for it ;)

I managed to use the snake-charming technique to bring the cable to the hand, but that's a lot of work... This also motivated me to revive some code for graphical manipulation of links @hsu wrote a couple years ago when I have some time :)
